facts.text: 8th recorded perihelion passage of Halley's Comet
2nd Lateran Council (10th ecumenical council) opens in Rome
Jews are expelled from Orange Burgandy by Philibert of Luxembourg
John Dudley becomes Earl Marshal of England
First known performance of Shakespeare's tragedy Macbeth at the Globe Theatre, London recorded by Simon Forman
Dutch East India Company (VOC) management sets new guidelines
Cromwell routes English parliament to house
Battle in Santa Cruz Bay, Tenerife: English fleet under Robert Blake sinks Spanish silver fleet
The former King James II of England, now deposed, lays siege to Derry.
Comet C/1702 H1 approaches within 0.0437 AUs of Earth
Nicholas Rowe's "Tragedy of Lady Jane Grey" premieres in London

French mathematician Pierre Louis Maupertuis begins his expedition to Lapland to measure a degree of latitude and prove the shape of the earth, he is joined by fellow scientists Anders Celsius, Charles Etienne Louis Camus, Alexis Claude Clairaut, and Pierre-Charles Le Monnier
